pullRequest.title: NMS-12843: Remote Poller: add remote polling details to service page
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR adds information about the perspectives (remote polling to the details page of a service)

JIRA (Issue Tracker): https://issues.opennms.org/browse/NMS-12843

nodes.bodyText: This is confusing. Could we make this currentPerspectiveOutagesForService?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -64,6 +64,11 @@
      */
     OnmsOutage currentOutageForService(OnmsMonitoredService service);
 
+    /**
+     * Return all current open outages for the given service be it detected from local or from remote (perspective).
+     */
+    Collection<OnmsOutage> currentOutagesForService(OnmsMonitoredService service);

nodes.bodyText: A location can be part of multiple services. Therefore this must be made unique.
The icon has no benefit here.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -314,7 +320,29 @@ function doDelete() { - + +
+
Application Perspective Monitoring
+ + + + + + + <% ServiceJspUtil util = new ServiceJspUtil(service, outages); + for(OnmsMonitoringLocation location : util.getAllPerspectives()) { + Optional outage = util.getOutageForPerspective(location); + %> + +
PerspectivePolling StatusOutage ID
<%=location.getLocationName()%>
